mapper.insert: insert into t_parcel (project_code, project_name, item_ids, pickup_code, logistic_code, shipper_code, house_code, receiver_name, receiver_mobile, receive_address) values (#{projectCode}, #{projectName}, #{itemIds}, #{pickupCode}, #{logisticCode}, #{shipperCode}, #{houseCode}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverMobile}, #{receiveAddress});
